Trinity/Nightlight::

Nightlight had the bad feeling that something was wrong and she said 
to Aerotaur "thanks for all, Aerotaur, I going to check if Trinity is 
ok..."

Nightlight left the room.

****************
Trinity was crying and heard someone arrived, she looked that was 
Grounded  and "It's Burnning Hammer... " sob"I don't know what has 
happened "sob"we were playing and... and.. " She continued crying





--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded saw Trinity stop then run the back the way she had 
come....He
> heard her wail and ran to her..
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Trinity:
> >
> > Trinity noticed that Burning Hammer wan't follow her, she walked
> > until she was where BH was unconcious.
> >
> > "Burning Hammer??" said Trinity while she walked close to him, she
> > smelled him and she knew that he was alive, with one of her front-
> > paws, the little-one touch Bh's Shoulder "Come on, Burning Hammer,
> > itsn't nice that... YOu're scare me... Burning Hammer??? please I
> > don't like that sort of joke..." said worried Trinity, as soon as 
she
> > knew that BH wasn't joking she started crying a
> > lound "AEROTAAAAAUUUUURRR, NIGHTLIIIIIIGGHT.... WAAAAAA!!!!"
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > Bunring Hammer runs out of breath out of the worry he was 
getting
> > from these
> > > memories that were haunting him. He stumbles inside of the base.
> > >
> > > Burning Hammer: Get out of my head. I didn't kill anybody!
> > >
> > > He falls over unconcious...
> > >
